texts.name: Fa Hai
texts.biography: Fa Hai is a pioneer in practicing exorcism. He believes that the souls should enter the afterworld after the death of the bodies.

specialty.description:
{Dhuta Seekers and Dhuta Walkers}

Increases Speed of any Dhuta Seekers or Dhuta Walkers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for 4 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Dhuta Seekers
